1.title: Teach Them a Lesson
1.plot: Two like-minded women, Alice and Beverley, are accompanied with their partners, Errol and Diz, on a double date. Shortly, it expands into a triple date, introducing Cheyenne and Farren, and everything seems to be fine. The meal is quickly ruined by a heated confrontation between Beverley and Errol, and this triggers her to fuel the conversation about justice for women in a mistreated relationship. The innocent Cheyenne is seduced into the plan but she doesn't realise how deeply involved she already is.

2.title: Behind the Mask
2.plot: The trio's mission to gain respect, love and money is executed. A heist takes place in order to shock and scare Errol. Unaware that Alice, Beverly and Cheyenne are the ones behind the masks, Errol and his boys are unknowingly swinging this plan out of control. An unapologetic bad decision turns the whole situation upside down to a point of no return. There is no choice but to protect them selves and Cheyenne's loyalty is tested.

3.title: Was It Worth It?
3.plot: A panicking Cheyenne drives Alice and Beverley away from the office. Close to tears, Cheyenne is becoming untrustworthy. The girls comfort her and express that they are all still able to walk out of this freely. In having to motivate and calm down Cheyenne, she becomes a liability and the real intentions of the night come to light. With a stand off between the girls, Cheyenne starts to see a different perspective of the heist. With more twists and turns, the climax of this final episode will have your curiosity and suspicions satisfied.

imdb.plot outline: This 3 part mini-series is a suspense-driven crime-thriller about a trio of young women who all want the same desire of respect, love and money. In an attempt to teach their boyfriends a lesson, they set out to get what they rightfully deserve. With the plan being fuelled by anger, the initial plan takes some twists and turns, ultimately leaving the girls with decisions that will change their life.
imdb.title: Sinners
plot: This 3 part mini-series is a suspense-driven crime-thriller about a trio of young women who all want the same desire of respect, love and money. In an attempt to teach their boyfriends a lesson, they set out to get what they rightfully deserve. With the plan being fuelled by anger, the initial plan takes some twists and turns, ultimately leaving the girls with decisions that will change their life.::R.M. Moses
